text: The Datsun 240Z is a sports car sold by former brand Datsun (Nissan) it was sold by Nissan from 1969-1973, Nissan sold 168,000 240z in America alone. It would be replaced by the 260z in 1974, and the 280z in 1975, == Yearly changes == * In 1970, the car was introduced to the United States. * In 1973, larger bumpers were added to the car. * In 1974, the car's name changed to 260z. Category:Sports cars Category:Nissan automobiles Category:1970s automobiles
title: Datsun 240z
